Been implementing some stuff over atom. One thing I found interesting
and m=
aybe someone could point me in the spec where this is covered (I
didn't see=
 it). Is I want to post 10 new items to the collection as a
group. Assuming=
 it doesn't exist, what would be the best way of
implementing that?

We can=
 obviously handle this in a custom restful api but would prefer
to support =
atom for easier client consumption.

Greg

Le doute n'est pas une condi=
tion agr=E9able, mais la certitude est absurde.
